name: OnlineChatCenters
tag_list: live-chat-software, live-chat, live-support, live-support-software, live-chat-support-software, live-help, customer-service, customer-support, support, chat
overview:
OnlineChatCenters is a live chat support application used by website owners to monitor and interact with their site’s visitors. OCC, short for OnlineChatCenters, provides a simple interface through desktop software, cloud-based web application and mobile applications for site owners to provide real time customer service, sales support and other interaction needs through a robust chat window. Ideal for e-commerce websites and other companies requiring continuous customer/visitor interaction and support, OCC comes with a full suite of features including but not limited to:

multiple operators/users
multiple websites/departments
256-bit SSL encrypted chats
canned messages
timed chat invites
fully customizable chat windows & branding
reporting
real time language translation
hosted knowledgebase and much more…visit the full list of features here: http://www.onlinechatcenters.com/feature-list

OnlineChatCenters is free to use for 1 operator and 1 department with limited features and ad-supported. Additional features, operators and departments are available for monthly or annual fees. OCC’s pricing can be viewed here: http://www.onlinechatcenters.com/live-chat-pricing Each new account includes a 10 day, fully featured free trial.
